title: Dzigie
author: Dzigie
content: I see incredible nonsense in the cryptocurrency market today. For example, according to a news I read today, the total number of cryptocurrencies in the market has exceeded 10000 (1). We know that many of these are shit coins. If Satoshi was among us today or if an AI account was created with his forum posts, what would he tell us about current issues? Sometimes when I read current news, I ask myself what Satoshi would say if he were among us.(1) https://altindex.com/news/new-crypto-coins-on-the-market-in-five-months

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Quote from: Dzigie on July 28, 2023, 08:12:00 PM If Satoshi was among us today or if an AI account was created with his forum posts, what would he tell us about current issues? Sometimes when I read current news, I ask myself what Satoshi would say if he were among us.No one can pretend to know what he would think or say.About the AI, some people have created this AI : https://www.talk2satoshi.com/, which pretends to simulate Satoshi's replies based on his messages.I think it's incomplete and bad, but if you're interested, you can have a look...

comments.author: sysoe
comments.body: Yeah, it's interesting how he'd feel. The sheer number of cryptos that lack real purpose definitely does not align with his original Bitcoin vision. But I don't think it would bother him too much. He is the King, and his focus was always on innovation and giving power back to the people.
